name: Brain-food.GitHub.io
body:
# Brain_Food
The right fuel for your brain can help you win the fight against homework assignments and crazy exams, but it's not easy to keep track of your eating habits when the next deadline is always around the corner. Brain_Food was made to provide students with a quick resource for healthy eating ideas, and to give students at UH Manoa information on how to buy healthy foods and ingredients near campus.

As the average college student has limited time and financial means to support healthy eating in the name of brainpower, Brain_Food also lists both the estimated time needed to follow a recipe from stat to finish, and the estimated cost of recipe ingredients.

Use Brain_Food and activate your brain's beast mode!
